item.title: 9 Palindrome Number
item.description: class Solution { public: bool isPalindrome(int x) { string s = to_string(x); for(int i = 0;i<s.size();i++) { if(s[i] != s[s.size()-i-1]) return false; } return true; } };```

item.title: 8 String to Integer (Atoi)
item.description: class Solution { public: int myAtoi(string s) { int i = 0,flag = 0; while(i<s.size() && s[i] == ' ') i++; if(i == s.size() || !(s[i] == '+' || s[i] == '-' || isdigit(s[i]))) return 0; if(s[i] == '+' || s[i] == '-') { flag = s[i] == '-' ? 1:0; i++; } long ans = 0; while(i<s.size() && isdigit(s[i])) { ans = ans*10 + s[i] - '0'; if(flag) { if(-ans > INT_MAX) return INT_MAX; if(-ans < INT_MIN) return INT_MIN; } else { if(ans > INT_MAX) return INT_MAX; if(ans < INT_MIN) return INT_MIN; } i++; } ans = flag ?

item.title: 7 Reverse Integer
item.description: class Solution { public: int reverse(int x) { long X = x; int flag = 0; if(X < 0) { X = -X; flag = 1; } long ans = 0; string s = to_string(X); for(int i = s.size()-1;i>=0;i--) ans = ans*10 + s[i] - '0'; ans = flag ? -ans : ans; int Max = 2147483647; int Min = -2147483648; if(ans <= Max && ans >= Min) return ans; else return 0; } };

item.title: 6 ZigZag Conversion
item.description: class Solution { public: string convert(string s, int numRows) { if(s.size() == 0) return ""; int n = s.size(); vector<vector<char>>Map(numRows,vector<char>(n,' ')); int mode = 0; int i = 0; int x = -1,y = 0; while(i<n) { //竖排 if(mode == 0) { for(int j = 0;j<numRows && i<n;j++) { if(j == 0) x++; Map[j][x] = s[i]; y = j; i++; } } else { for(int j = 1;j<numRows-1 && i<n;j++) { x++; y--; Map[y][x] = s[i]; i++; } } mode = (mode+1)%2; } string ans = ""; for(int i = 0;i<numRows;i++) { for(int j = 0;j<n;j++) { if(Map[i][j] !

item.title: 5 Longest Palindromic Substring
item.description: dp class Solution { public: string longestPalindrome(string s) { if(s.size() == 0) return ""; int n = s.size(),ans = 1,l1 = 0,l2 = 0; vector<vector<int>>dp(n,vector<int>(n,0)); for(int i = 0;i<n;i++) dp[i][i] = 1; for(int l = 1;l<n;l++) { for(int i = 0;i<n-l;i++) { int j = i+l; if(j == i+1) { dp[i][j] = s[i] == s[j] ? 2 : 0; } else { if(dp[i+1][j-1] && s[i] == s[j]) dp[i][j] = dp[i+1][j-1] + 2; } if(ans < dp[i][j]) { ans = dp[i][j]; l1 = i; l2 = j; } } } return s.

item.title: 4 Median of Two Sorted Arrays
item.description: class Solution { public: double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) { int m = nums1.size(); int n = nums2.size(); int k1,k2; //odd if( (m+n)%2 == 0) { k1 = (m+n)/2; k2 = k1-1; } else { k1 = (m+n)/2; k2 = k1; } int i = 0,j = 0; int temp = 0; int t = 0; while(i<nums1.size() && j <nums2.size()) { if(nums1[i] <= nums2[j]) { if(t == k1) temp += nums1[i]; if(t == k2) temp += nums1[i]; i++; } else { if(t == k1) temp += nums2[j]; if(t == k2) temp += nums2[j]; j++; } t++; } while(i<nums1.

item.title: 3 Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
item.description: 滑动窗口 class Solution { public: int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) { int ans = 0,i = 0,j = 1; if(s.size() == 1) ans = 1; unordered_map<char,int>Map; Map[s[i]] = i; while(i<s.size() && j<s.size()) { auto it = Map.find(s[j]); if(it != Map.end() && it->second >= i) { ans = max(ans,j-i); i = Map[s[j]] + 1; } else { Map[s[j]] = j; ans = max(ans,j-i+1); j++; } } return ans; } };

item.title: 2 Add Two Numbers
item.description: /** * Definition for singly-linked list. * struct ListNode { * int val; * ListNode *next; * ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {} * ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {} * ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {} * }; */ class Solution { public: ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) { ListNode *p = new ListNode(0); ListNode *head = p; int c = 0; while(l1 && l2) { int r = (l1->val + l2->val + c) %10; c = (l1->val + l2->val + c)/10; p->next = new ListNode(r); p = p->next; l1 = l1->next; l2 = l2->next; } while(l1) { int r = (l1->val + c)%10; c = (l1->val + c)/10; p->next = new ListNode(r); p = p->next; l1 = l1->next; } while(l2) { int r = (l2->val + c)%10; c = (l2->val + c)/10; p->next = new ListNode(r); p = p->next; l2 = l2->next; } if(c) { p->next = new ListNode(c); } return head->next; } }; '''

item.title: 今天好难过
item.description: 一点点内心想法： 2021/1/8： 昨天梦见下雪了，真是可笑，广州这种地方是不会下雪的。但是睡梦中隐隐约约听见了风怒吼着卷动树叶的声音，像是冬天终于迎来了它的征程。这地方终于有了点冬天的味道，不是吗。 2021/1/15： 今天去医院了，emmmmm
